custom_css: .new-footer {display: flex; justify-content: space-between; background: transparent; overflow: hidden;}

@media (max-width: 768px) {.new-footer {display: grid; grid-template-columns: 1fr 1fr; } .carlos-social-icons li span {width: 100%; height: 100%; max-width: 20px; max-height: 20px; } .footer-logo-image {max-width: 175px; } .policy-links {font-size: 10px; flex: 1; }}
